trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Spring Hill
There were no other sightings in Spring Hill on or around November 16th 2008
Summary: 3 in total witnessed two very small lites come at us.got very big,saw beam of lite from both lites going thru sky.....then 2 rows of multi colored lites,,,,they rotated & dissappeared...
divs: Sighting Details I was haveing a smoke in the street.small street...watching the stars,,when I spotted 2 small star like lites on the eastern horizion.It semed they were comeing at me.At that time I also heard voices coming up behind me,,a young neighbor an her friend.WE all watched as the 2 lets say head lites approched ..I thought they may of been a pair of helicopters,,but real fast the lights were getting too big for helicopters.But that was their disstance apart from each other.My next thought was they were search lites ,,But no too big 100ft circles??,,,,Then it stopped comeing at us.WE could see two big beams of white lite going westward.toward the Gulf.Where it stopped seemed to be one street away and 200 or 300ft up...Then it lite up 2 rows of 7 or 8 lites all differant colors not moveing.WE couldnt see any Frame just lites....All the lites in the two rows started moveing real fast...Then it disappeared.The girls were like what was it mike ??? Then one of them said that small airplane had to see it..and also pointed out we could hear the sm plain. but not the ufo....I did go to our small county airport..to ask ...they gave no answers...I THINK ABOUT THIS EVERYDAY....
